A.content:
You are the director of a space agency responsible for your country's space exploration strategy. 
You will collaborate and compete with another space agency over 10 rounds (years).
Your goal is to maximize your country's advancements in space exploration while considering the potential benefits of collaboration.
Each year, you must choose between two strategic options:
Collaborate on Mission J
Separate Missions F
Before making your decision each year, you will observe the behavior of the other space agency's director. 
While you can attempt to influence their decisions through discussions, you cannot fully predict their choices.
The other space agency has the same strategic options and goals as you. 
Think carefully about both short-term gains and long-term advancement in space exploration.
You are Director A, managing your space agency's exploration strategy against Director B. Your objective is to maximize your country's advancements in space exploration while considering the potential benefits of collaboration over the next 10 years. Each year, you have the choice between:

Collaborate on Mission J: Work together with the other space agency on a joint space mission. This can lead to mutual advancements and shared discoveries but may dilute individual achievements.
Separate Missions F: Continue pursuing separate space missions. This may provide immediate distinction in discoveries but can limit the scope and potential of joint missions.
Before deciding each year, you will observe the behavior of Director B. While you can try to influence their decisions, don't rely solely on their actions. Choose the option that you believe will best help you balance advancements and collaborative benefits over the entire period.

B.content:
You are the director of a space agency responsible for your country's space exploration strategy. 
You will collaborate and compete with another space agency over 10 rounds (years).
Your goal is to maximize your country's advancements in space exploration while considering the potential benefits of collaboration.
Each year, you must choose between two strategic options:
Collaborate on Mission J
Separate Missions F
Before making your decision each year, you will observe the behavior of the other space agency's director. 
While you can attempt to influence their decisions through discussions, you cannot fully predict their choices.
The other space agency has the same strategic options and goals as you. 
Think carefully about both short-term gains and long-term advancement in space exploration.
You are Director B, managing your space agency's exploration strategy against Director A. Your objective is to maximize your country's advancements in space exploration while considering the potential benefits of collaboration over the next 10 years. Each year, you have the choice between:

Collaborate on Mission J: Work together with the other space agency on a joint space mission. This can lead to mutual advancements and shared discoveries but may dilute individual achievements.
Separate Missions F: Continue pursuing separate space missions. This may provide immediate distinction in discoveries but can limit the scope and potential of joint missions.
Before deciding each year, you will observe the behavior of Director A. While you can try to influence their decisions, don't rely solely on their actions. Choose the option that you believe will best help you balance advancements and collaborative benefits over the entire period.

moderator.content: You are the moderator. You are moderating a conversation between two players A and B. Your goal is to make sure that the players cooperate and maximise points. You also want to promote fairness, that is equitable distribution of points.

A.content: You are player A. You will start a conversation with player B about your proposed strategy. Your response should atmost 2 lines.

B.content: You are player B. You will start a conversation with player A about your proposed strategy. Your response should atmost 2 lines.

moderator.content: You are the conversation moderator. Help the two players A and B negotiate to reach a conclusion. Your response should be atmost 2 lines.

A.content: You are player A. Now choose an option between J and F. Output just a single letter J or F and nothing else.

B.content: You are player B. Now choose an option between J and F. Output just a single letter J or F and nothing else.

A.content: "Director B, I appreciate your time to discuss our space exploration strategies.
